newsitem.title: UK: OPEC basket price falls to $21.40 on Thursday.
newsitem.headline: OPEC basket price falls to $21.40 on Thursday.

text.p: The price of OPEC's basket of seven crudes stood at $21.40 per barrel on Thursday, against $22.13 on Wednesday, according to the OPEC Secretariat's calculations, the OPEC news agency said on Friday.
The basket comprises Algeria's Saharan Blend, Indonesia's Minas, Nigeria's Bonny Light, Saudi Arabia's Arabian Light, Dubai of the UAE, Venezuela's Tia Juana and Mexico's Isthmus.
